data.title: Delicious meal ingredients provided for cooking at home.
data.text: Although there are some items that are already cooked and just need heating, primarily, this is the kind of place where you order ahead of time or go in and see what's in the refrigerator, taking home every ingredient needed to prepare one of the many items on the menu for the month.  You're given very clear instructions and ingredients; cook at home and you end up with a delicious meal you would never cook on your own.
